prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Henry N. Bailey. Receipt, 27 July 1847. Accession 38315, Personal Papers Collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Purchased from Al Braye Auctions, 2412 Daniel Street, Winston-Salem, North Carolina, 27127-2868.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Receipt, 27 July 1847, for $183.86 1/2 from Henry N. Bailey to Thomas Bailey being Henry Bailey's portion of the proceeds of the sale of the slaves from the estate of William Stanfield. This was pursuant to an order from the Halifax County, Virginia, court.
